name: erdc-coevolve
short_description:
This is the analysis code used to perform the analysis described in the paper "Using residue coevolution to define functional amino acid networks in insect olfactory receptors." by Dan Valente, Stephen Grimme, Kevin Wanner, and Irene MacAllister.  

The project is a set of Matlab functions to import an MSA, estimate amino acid pair probabilities using Bayesian estimation, and calculate a normalized mutual information measure between all columns in the MSA.  See the paper and code for details.

The paper is currently under review, which is why we have no link to it now.
summary: Matlab code to calculate residue coevolution in an MSA
